Name: Apollo Rover - Check Subgraph Schema
Description:
Check subgraph schema against Apollo Studio. This should be run before deploying the subgraph service when promoting to higher environments.

The script installs the [Apollo Rover CLI](https://apollographql.com/docs/rover) and runs the `rover subgraph check` command.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
ROVER_VERSION=$(get_octopusvariable "ApolloRoverVersion")
[ -z "$ROVER_VERSION" ] || [ "$ROVER_VERSION" == "latest" ] && ROVER_VERSION="latest" || ROVER_VERSION="v$ROVER_VERSION"

curl -sSL https://rover.apollo.dev/nix/$ROVER_VERSION | sh

export APOLLO_KEY=$(get_octopusvariable "ApolloKey")

rover subgraph check $(get_octopusvariable "ApolloGraphRef") \
  --name $(get_octopusvariable "ApolloSubgraphName") \
  --schema $(get_octopusvariable "ApolloSchema")

Parameters.Name: ApolloRoverVersion
Parameters.Label: Apollo Rover Version
Parameters.HelpText:
The version of the Apollo Rover CLI to use for running `rover subgraph check`.
May be either semver (i.e. `0.19.1`), `latest`, or empty

Parameters.Name: ApolloKey
Parameters.Label: Apollo Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API key to Apollo Studio

Parameters.Name: ApolloSchemaPackage
Parameters.Label: Schema Package
Parameters.HelpText: The package containing the schema file

Parameters.Name: ApolloSchema
Parameters.Label: Schema
Parameters.HelpText: The path to the schema file
